affirmation: Let my finances grow by leaps and bounds
I now claim and feel the Spirit of prosperity in all of my affairs
Money is good; I use it wisely, constructively, and judiciously
I have a wonderful work, in a wonderful way, I give wonderful service, for wonderful pay
By day and by night I am being prospered abundantly in all of my interests
Every cell, nerve, tissue, and muscle of my body is now being made whole, perfect, and complete
I am whole, perfect, strong, powerful, loving, harmonious, and happy
I am expressing health, harmony, and peace in all areas of my life
Day by day in every way I am getting better and better
Health, Health, Health, Health
I believe in myself
I am worthy of the absolute best in my life
I am a thoroughly good person in every way
I always do my very best at everything I do
I like myself! I like myself! I like myself!
I am successful
I can do this and I know I can
I will achieve great things today
I deserve to have great success in my life
I like myself! I like myself! I like myself!
I like myself and I love my life
I am loved and I do love
I am attracting the love that I am
I allow the love from my own heart to heal all that I see
I love and approve of all that I am
